ESP.ORIGINAL:
Next time send your best.
I'm still waiting in my shack on the cliff up north.
-Zaroff
ESP.TRADUIT:
下次派个厉害点的来。
我还在北方的悬崖小屋等你
-扎罗夫

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dr. Lesko,
I can't continue working with you on your projects. You are too reckless. You may mean well but your "creations" will inevitably end up causing more harm than good. I just want to help people. That's why I'm heading west to tend to settlers of small camps that were turned away from the major settlements.
I wish you well, but I hope someone stops you... before it's too late.
-Dr. Schweitzer
ESP.TRADUIT:
莱斯科博士，
我没法继续参与你的项目了。你太鲁莽了。你或许出于好意，但你的“作品”到头来必然会造成的伤害大于益处。我只想帮助人们。因此我要前往西边，去照顾那些被大聚居地拒之门外的小聚居地的定居者。
我祝你好运，但我希望有人能阻止你……在一切都太晚之前。
-施韦策博士

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey Moira,
It's Butcher. I'm running out of scrap metal. If you have any to spare could you have Crazy Wolfgang bring it on down to the car dealership for me?
I'm still working on that new assault rifle but damn if it isn't a bitch to find the parts.
Sincerely,
Butcher.
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，莫伊拉，
是屠夫。我快没废金属了。如果你有多余的，能让疯狂的沃尔夫冈帮我带到汽车经销商那里吗？
我还在研究那把新突击步枪，但找零件真他妈的难。
此致，
屠夫。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear son,
You've always hidden behind your words. We Vole's should be men of action. I am sending you this note along with a key to my old armor. It is hidden in Rock Creek Caverns. If you can fight your way to it and come back to me wearing it, I will gladly welcome you home. Until then you're on your own.
Sincerely,
Your Father.
P.S. Stop including nude drawings of your mother in your letters. It's creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的儿子，
你总是光说不练。我们沃尔家族的人应该是行动派。我给你写这封信的同时，还附上了打开我旧盔甲的钥匙。它就藏在洛克溪洞穴里。如果你能一路战斗找到它，并穿着它回来见我，我会很高兴地欢迎你回家。在那之前，你得靠自己了。
此致，
你的父亲。
又及：别再在信里画你妈妈的裸体了。真让人毛骨悚然。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
In light of new information, we have decided to cease our aggressions towards Megaton.
All troops are to hold their assaults until I give the order.
- Michael
ESP.TRADUIT:
鉴于新情报，我们决定停止对核弹镇的进攻。
所有部队在接到我的命令前，不得发起攻击。
-迈克尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again. Is there something exciting about watching me? Look: Go talk to Jenny or Leo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你。看着我很有趣吗？听着：去找珍妮或里奥吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6C] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hooo weee! Look at you! Now I haven't seen one of those Vault jumpsuits in, wow, a LONG time. Pretty damn good condition, too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦！看看你！我好久没见过这种避难所制服了，哇，真是好久了。而且状态还不错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Billy Creel. You call me Billy, all right? I know Megaton looks more like a boneyard than a town, but it ain't all bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫比利·克里尔。叫我比利就行，好吗？我知道梅加顿看起来更像个坟场而不是镇子，但它也没那么糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take me and Maggie, for instance. We make do just fine. I trade the stuff I scavenge, and she helps keep me on the straight and narrow. He he he.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就拿我和玛吉来说吧。我们过得挺好。我把我搜刮到的东西拿去交易，她帮我保持正道。呵呵呵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well hot damn! Someone new! Always a pleasure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，太棒了！来了个新人！总是件乐事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Billy Creel. You call me Billy, all right? I know Megaton looks more like a boneyard than a town, but it ain't all bad.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, bud. It'd be best if you just drift on by and leave us alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，老兄。你最好还是走开，别管我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_greeting_000042f7_1.ogg
NPC : [06000A65] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Lucas Simms, town sheriff. And mayor too, when the need arises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫卢卡斯·西姆斯，是镇上的警长。需要的时候，我也是镇长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : suspicious and threatening (deadly serious)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a weird look about you, boy. The kind that means trouble. I give everyone a fair shake. But if you do anything remotely stupid, you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看上去有点奇怪，小子。那种会带来麻烦的样子。我给每个人一个公平的机会。但如果你敢做任何蠢事，你就死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : suspicious and threatening (deadly serious)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Lucas Simms, town sheriff. And mayor too, when the need arises.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : suspicious and threatening (deadly serious)

ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道为什么，但我喜欢你，小子！有种感觉告诉我，你不错。所以欢迎来到梅加顿！需要什么就叫我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : with camaraderie

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Lucas Simms, town sheriff. And mayor too, when the need arises.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Lucas Simms, town sheriff. And mayor too, when the need arises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫卢卡斯·西姆斯，是镇上的警长。需要的时候，我也是镇长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must be getting slow in my old age. Thanks for saving my hide, there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定是老了，反应慢了。谢谢你刚才救了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't disarmed the bomb yet? That's some serious Pre-War hardware. So go easy, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没拆除炸弹吗？那可是战前的高级货。小心点，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't suppose you've disarmed that bomb?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想必你还没拆除炸弹吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be damned! You did it, didn't you? You disarmed that thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼！你做到了，是不是？你把那玩意儿拆除了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your reward. Hell, why don't you move in? Could use someone like you. Got an empty place here you can use. Here's the key and deed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的奖励。嘿，你为什么不搬进来呢？我们这里正缺你这样的人。这里有个空地方你可以使用。这是钥匙和地契。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain't much to look at. But talk with Moira. She's got random odds and ends you might be able to spruce the place up with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方看起来不怎么样。但去和莫伊拉谈谈。她有些零七八碎的东西，也许能帮你把这里装点得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be damned! You did it, didn't you? You disarmed that thing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼！你做到了，是不是？你把那玩意儿拆除了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And all without asking for pay, too. Hell, why don't you move in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且还不用付钱。嘿，你为什么不搬进来呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the key and the deed to an empty house. Consider yourself a Megaton citizen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是空房子的钥匙和地契。你现在是梅加顿的市民了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh and talk with Moira at Craterside Supply. She's got random odds and ends you might be able to spruce the place up with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，还有去和陨石坑补给站的莫伊拉谈谈。她有些零七八碎的东西，也许能帮你把那里装点得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hey! How's it going? You need something, you just ask. Disarming that bomb, well... that's something I'm not ever likely to forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！你好吗？需要什么就直说。拆除那颗炸弹……那件事我永远都不会忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, now... how's my favorite explosives expert doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么……我最喜欢的爆炸物专家近况如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Doc Church and I run this clinic. Now, before you go askin' me for help, you'd better know the rules. Rule one: don't bother me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是教堂医生，我经营这家诊所。现在，在你去找我帮忙之前，你最好先了解规则。规则一：别烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do bother me, you better be damn near dead. I'm busy enough takin' care of people I actually like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你敢烦我，你最好是快死了。我忙着呢，得照顾我喜欢的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow my rule, I'll keep you patched up, I'll keep getting' paid, and we'll get along just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵守我的规矩，我就帮你包扎，我也能继续拿钱，咱们就能相安无事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you went and got yourself irradiated. Too bad for you, I'm off duty. Stop by the clinic in the morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你把自己给辐射到了。真不走运，我下班了。明早来诊所吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy, you're glowin' like a goddamn reactor core. You need help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小子，你浑身发着光，就像该死的反应堆核心一样。需要帮助吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Girl, you're glowin' like a goddamn reactor core. You need help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 姑娘，你浑身发着光，就像该死的反应堆核心一样。需要帮助吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are you standin' there bleedin' on my floor for? If you need help, then ask for it, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底站在我地板上流血干什么？如果你需要帮助，那就说出来，该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came in here on your own power, so you must not be busted up too bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己走进来的，说明你伤得不算太重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd best have cancer because from the looks of you, you're breaking rule number one right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好是得了癌症，因为从你的情况来看，你现在正违反第一条规矩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: For Christ's sake, you don't look sick and you sure as hell don't look dead, so why are you bothering me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在上帝的份上，你看起来既不像是生病，也不像是要死了，那你为什么还来烦我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6E] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey smoothskin, do you need something? A drink, maybe? Anything? Anything at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，细皮嫩肉的，你需要点什么？来杯喝的，怎么样？需要什么？需要什么都行？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Nervous. Very nervous. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy
NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Nervous and defeated. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's you. Would you like to slap me around before you drink? I'm told that it's a lot of fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是你啊。在喝酒之前，你想先揍我一顿吗？我听说这挺有意思的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Sarcastic and defeated. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh good. If it isn't my favorite smoothskin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了。这不是我最喜欢的细皮嫩肉的人吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Nervous and sarcastic. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, pal. What do you need?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Nervous but friendly. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you again! Need a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴再次见到你！来杯喝的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Nervous but friendly. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, man... I'm glad to see you. Moriarty's been especially nasty lately and I need a friendly face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，伙计……很高兴见到你。莫里亚蒂最近尤其可恶，我需要一张友善的面孔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : Nervous but friendly. Used to be treated like crap. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, look. Another one of your pampered vault assholes. Look here, vault asshole -- I don't like you. Stay clear of me and we'll have no trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看哪。又是一个你们那些被惯坏的避难所混蛋。听着，避难所混蛋——我可不喜欢你。离我远点，咱们就相安无事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, look. Another one of you Wasteland assholes. Look here, asshole -- I don't like you. Stay clear of me and we'll have no trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，看哪。又是一个你们废土的混蛋。听着，混蛋——我可不喜欢你。离我远点，咱们就相安无事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt1b_000042f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long time, no see. You takin' care of yourself out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好久不见。你在外面还过得去吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been a while. You need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一段时间没见了。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This'd better be good. I'm in no mood for your shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好说点好听的。我现在可没心情听废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say what's on your mind then get out of my face.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well goddamn. You're new, right? I've got to admit, the outfit's a little weird, but that's okay, that's okay. Name's Leo Stahl. It's a pleasure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的。你是新来的吧？我得承认，你这身打扮有点奇怪，不过没关系，没关系。我叫利奥·斯塔尔。很高兴认识你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well goddamn. You're new, right? Name's Leo Stahl. It's a pleasure! It's a pleasure! Yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的。你是新来的吧？我叫利奥·斯塔尔。很高兴认识你！很高兴认识你！耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: <sighs> It's you. I was hoping that you'd have moved on. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹气>是你啊。我还以为你已经走了呢。你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddammit. Can't you leave me alone? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼。你就不能让我一个人待着吗？你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you're going to tell on me, do it. Otherwise, tell me what you want and then get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你要告发我，那就告吧。否则，告诉我你想要什么，然后滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey hey! Nice to see you! Everything okay? You doing all right? You need something? Come on, talk to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿嘿！很高兴见到你！一切都好吗？你还好吧？你需要什么？来，跟我说说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright! Good to see you again! What's new? Feel like having a drink? C'mon, let's talk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！很高兴再次见到你！有什么新鲜事？想喝一杯吗？来，咱们聊聊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, buddy! Good to see you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : [06000A6B] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You pull another stunt like you did, and you're finished in this town. Do you understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是再敢耍什么花招，你在这个镇上就混不下去了。你明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Anger
NPC : [06000A60] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy
NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you're staying out of trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看到你没惹上麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got my eye on you. Don't do anything stupid.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Staying out of trouble, I hope? Don't want to have to waste good bullets on your sorry hide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你没惹上麻烦吧？我可不想把好子弹浪费在你那可怜的身躯上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : deadly serious EmotionType : Anger
NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Comment (NAM2) : EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well now. That's a surprise! I'm used to every asshole smoothskin in this town giving me shit just because I look like a corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这倒是稀奇！我已经习惯了这个镇上的每个细皮嫩肉的家伙都因为我长得像个尸体而给我脸色看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see that there are a few worthwhile people around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴看到这儿还有一些值得交往的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen... Moriarty'd have my head if he caught me selling at a discount, but for you, I'll risk it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着……如果莫里亚蒂发现我降价出售，他会要了我的脑袋，但看在你的份上，我愿意冒这个险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel like helping me out, you can get me some more RadAway. Those Church of the Atom idiots keep radiating themselves all to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意帮我的话，可以帮我弄点抗辐宁。那些原子教的白痴老是把自己辐射得不成样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jake [11008D15] (mod) Quest : ([11000EA6]aaMedicalAssistance) Medical Assistance EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajakevoicetype\aamedicala_medicalassiista_00000ea8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Ten should do it. I don't have much to give but I'd greatly appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。十瓶应该就够了。我没什么可以给你的，但我会非常感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jake [11008D15] (mod) Quest : ([11000EA6]aaMedicalAssistance) Medical Assistance EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajakevoicetype\aamedicala_medicalassistan_00000eab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I think I can manage that.

ESP.TRADUIT: 哦真的吗？太好了。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jake [11008D15] (mod) Quest : ([11000EA6]aaMedicalAssistance) Medical Assistance EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajakevoicetype\aamedicala_medicalassistan_00000eae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I actually already have ten RadAway on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我身上其实已经有十瓶抗辐宁了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I don't blame you. Those idiots should just learn to stop standing in irradiated water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我不怪你。那些白痴应该学会别站在辐射水里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jake [11008D15] (mod) Quest : ([11000EA6]aaMedicalAssistance) Medical Assistance EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajakevoicetype\aamedicala_medicalassistan_00000ead_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have time right now.

ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这是些瓶盖。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jake [11008D15] (mod) Quest : ([11000EA6]aaMedicalAssistance) Medical Assistance EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajakevoicetype\aamedicala_medicalassistan_00000eb2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I got that RadAway for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我已经帮你弄到抗辐宁了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jake [11008D15] (mod) Quest : ([11000EA6]aaMedicalAssistance) Medical Assistance EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajakevoicetype\aamedicala_medicalassistan_00000eb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it can get boring being a guard sometimes. I had some books but I dropped them when some raiders chased me out of Hamilton's Hideaway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎，当守卫有时候也挺无聊的。我有几本书，但在汉密尔顿的藏身处被一群掠夺者追的时候弄丢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rusty [11000ED1] (mod) Quest : ([11000ED0]aaRustyQuest) Long Lost Literature EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarustyvoicetype\aarustyque_aarustyquestpro_00000ee7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... I like to read alone sometimes? Anyway could you go get 'em for me or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……我有时候喜欢一个人看书？反正，你能不能帮我把书找回来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rusty [11000ED1] (mod) Quest : ([11000ED0]aaRustyQuest) Long Lost Literature EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarustyvoicetype\aarustyque_aarustyquestpro_00000ee9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you doing in Hamilton's Hideaway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去汉密尔顿的藏身处干什么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sweet. Alright come back to me when you find them. And do it soon. I'm getting reaaally bored here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。找到书后回来找我。快点啊。我快无聊死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rusty [11000ED1] (mod) Quest : ([11000ED0]aaRustyQuest) Long Lost Literature EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarustyvoicetype\aarustyque_aarustyquestacc_00000eeb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess I can go find your books.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想我可以去帮你找书。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rusty [11000ED1] (mod) Quest : ([11000ED0]aaRustyQuest) Long Lost Literature EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarustyvoicetype\aarustyque_aarustyquestden_00000eed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get your own damn books back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你个书呆子。自己去把书找回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, did I not mention that? Huh. That's weird. Thanks though. You're a good guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我没提到过吗？哈。真奇怪。不过还是谢谢你。你是个好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rusty [11000ED1] (mod) Quest : ([11000ED0]aaRustyQuest) Long Lost Literature EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarustyvoicetype\aarustyque_aarustyquesttur_00000eef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but you could've mentioned I was retrieving your EROTIC novels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，但你应该告诉我你要我找的是色情小说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually yes. Some mole rats got into my place somehow and stole my childhood rifle. If you could get it I'd really appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。有些鼹鼠不知道怎么跑到我家里，把我小时候的步枪给偷走了。如果你能帮我找回来，我会非常感激的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Quest : ([110016C8]aaSimmsOlRifle) Simms' Ol' Rifle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquesimms\aasimmsolr_aasimmsolrifles_000016ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. The mole rats have a nest in an old mine across from Megaton's entrance. I'm sure its somewhere in there. Come back to me when you find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。鼹鼠们在梅加顿入口对面的一个旧矿场里安了家。我确定我的步枪就在那里。你找到后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Quest : ([110016C8]aaSimmsOlRifle) Simms' Ol' Rifle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquesimms\aasimmsolr_aasimmsolriflea_000016cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. You're probably a busy man. Just don't go getting' into trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解。你可能很忙。但别惹事上身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Quest : ([110016C8]aaSimmsOlRifle) Simms' Ol' Rifle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquesimms\aasimmsolr_aasimmsolrifled_000016ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh thank you very much. This one has great sentimental value. But maybe you'll get some use out of my newer one. Enjoy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢你。这把枪对我有着特殊的情感价值。不过，我的新枪也许你能用得上。请享用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Quest : ([110016C8]aaSimmsOlRifle) Simms' Ol' Rifle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquesimms\aasimmsolr_aasimmsolrifled_000016d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yessir. I've got it right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我就在这儿拿到了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Quest : ([110016C8]aaSimmsOlRifle) Simms' Ol' Rifle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquesimms\aasimmsolr_aasimmsolriflec_000016d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... let me know when you do.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A60] (ID) Quest : ([110016C8]aaSimmsOlRifle) Simms' Ol' Rifle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquesimms\aasimmsolr_aasimmsolriflen_000016d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh how very delightful. Yes. We'll get along swimmingly. But per chance do you have some time to spare for a new friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真是太好了。是的，我们会相处得非常融洽。不过，你是否有时间为新朋友腾出点空来呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt_0000233d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure to meet your acquaintance, sir.
Fantastic. You've passed the first trial. Now onto bigger game!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。你通过了第一场试炼。现在，让我们来面对更大的挑战！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt_00002349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're coming along quite nicely! Let's not waste time. Next I'd like you to slay a Mirelurk King in its own nesting hole. And have fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做得很好！别浪费时间了。接下来，我希望你能在泥沼蟹王的巢穴里将它击杀。祝你玩得愉快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt_0000234c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh those wonderful words. You sweep me off my feet. There's just one more creature left. But it's a big one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这些美妙的话语。你让我心花怒放。还有一个生物需要消灭，但它是个大块头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt_0000234e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You truly are worthy! But I have a small confession. I may have misled you about the hunting companion position...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个了不起的人！但我得坦白一件事。我可能对你所说的狩猎伙伴的职位有些误导……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt_00002351_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It gets so very lonely up here. And I've been wanting to share in the hunt with a new apprentice. But so very few can live up to my expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里真是太孤单了。我一直想找个新徒弟一起打猎。但很少有人能满足我的期望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt2_00002340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next you shall hunt down a Mama Yao Guai! The fiendish furry hellians. They make great rugs. Return to me once its done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来，你要去猎杀一只姚怪母兽！那些可恶的多毛恶魔。它们的皮用来做地毯再好不过了。完成后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt2_0000234a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is an Alpha Deathclaw in Old Olney. It stays in the sewers mostly making it hard to pick off. Kill it and consider yourself a true hunter!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥尔尼旧镇有一只阿尔法级死亡爪。它主要待在下水道里，很难对付。杀了它，你就算是一名真正的猎人了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt2_0000234f_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们快点结束这一切吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, I don't want someone to hunt with. I want someone to hunt. You are worthy. And you've come to me. I am truly grateful. I'll make this quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你明白吗，我不是想找人一起打猎。我是想找人去打猎。你够格。你找到了我。我真的很感激。我会速战速决的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt2_00002352_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well to be deemed worthy I expect you to hunt down some dangerous game. But I'm sure someone with such gusto as yourself will surpass expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要想被认为够格，我希望你能猎杀一些危险的猎物。但我相信，像你这样有干劲的人一定会超出我的期望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffprompt3_00002342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smashing. We'll start you off small. But not too small. In fact, giant. A giant ant queen. Kill one of those and get back to me. I await your return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。我们从小的开始。但也不能太小。事实上，是巨型生物。一只巨型蚁后。杀了它然后回来找我。我等着你回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffaccept_00002344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pity. I thought we'd be such great friends. Toodloo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜啊。我还以为我们会成为好朋友呢。再见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterquest_aazaroffdeny_00002346_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我有更紧急的事情要处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah... it's just... well... You seem nice enough. I have a real problem brewing. Think you could help me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯……就是……嗯……你看起来还不错。我遇到了一个大麻烦。你能帮我一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquesthelp_00002ae4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you okay? You seem pretty rattled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？你看起来很紧张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh thank you so much. This pack of ghoul extremists somehow heard about me and want me to either kill one of the Megaton settlers or turn myself in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太感谢你了。这群尸鬼极端分子不知怎么听说了我的事，他们想让我要么杀死一名梅加顿的居民，要么就自首。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestacce_00002ae6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. I'll help in any way I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我会尽我所能帮忙的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're crazy extremists, what do you expect? I need you to find them and either reason with them or kill them. Please, I don't have much time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是疯狂的极端分子，你还能指望什么？我需要你找到他们，要么跟他们讲道理，要么杀了他们。拜托了，我没多少时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestacce_00002ae8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I figured as much. Well let me know if you have a change of heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我也这么觉得。如果你改变了主意，就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestdeny_00002aea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh so the scared little traitor sent you, huh? Well why should I listen to a messenger of a coward?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是那个胆小的叛徒派你来的，是吗？那我为什么要听一个懦夫的使者的话？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael [11002AEB] (mod) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaghoulmichaelvoicetype\aagobsques_aaghoulextremis_00002aef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to leave Gob alone.
Maybe they are. Maybe they aren't. But the only good smoothskin is a dead smoothskin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他们是，也许他们不是。但唯一的好人类就是死人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael [11002AEB] (mod) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaghoulmichaelvoicetype\aagobsques_aaghoulextremis_00002af1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gob is a good person and so the rest of Megaton. None of them are any threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈布是个好人，梅加顿的其他人也是。他们都不会构成威胁。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael [11002AEB] (mod) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaghoulmichaelvoicetype\aagobsques_aaghoulextremis_00002af3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to hurt the people of Megaton, you'll have to go through me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想伤害梅加顿的人民，你就得先过我这一关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god! You got them to leave me alone? Thank you so much. I don't have anything to give you but if you need anything, let me know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我的天哪！你让他们放过我了？太感谢你了。我没什么可以给你的，但如果你需要什么，就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestfini_00002af7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sorted it out. They won't be bothering you anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经解决了。他们不会再打扰你了。
好吧，请快点行动。拜托了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestfini_00002afa_1.ogg
NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestretu_00002af9_1.ogg
NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestretu_00009a6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yessir. I'm pretty damn good as well. In fact, I've been working on a modified assault rifle, but I'm missing some parts. You feel like helping out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官。我也很厉害。事实上，我一直在研究一款改良型突击步枪，但我还缺一些零件。你能帮忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcherprompt_000030d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you some kind of mechanic?
Alright. Next we need a cocking handle. There should be one in the old Hubris Comics. Be careful, there's a crazed individual camping out in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。接下来我们需要一个枪机柄。老哈布里斯漫画店里应该有一个。小心点，里面有个疯子在游荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcherprompt_000030e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work. Next we need a frame. There should be one in the Corvega Factory. Be careful though, it's crawling with giant ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。接下来我们需要一个枪架。科维加工厂里应该有一个。不过要小心，那里到处都是巨型蚂蚁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcherprompt_000030e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, then there's only one part left, the butt plate. You should find it in the Scrapyard. Likely in a dumpster. Get it and the gun is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就只剩最后一个部件了，枪托板。你应该能在废料场找到它。很可能在垃圾桶里。找到它，枪就是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcherprompt_000030ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job boy-o! Now I've just got to stick it on there and... Whala! I call it the Blitz Rifle. I hope you kill many things with it. Enjoy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，小伙子！现在我只需把它装上去……好啦！我叫它“闪电步枪”。希望你用它杀很多敌人。好好享受吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcherprompt_000030ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup. I've got the final piece here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。我拿到最后一块零件了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you might, I need a release lever from the Red Racer Factory. There should be one in the CEO offices. Come back when you've got it
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可能会来。我需要一个来自红赛车工厂的释放杆。CEO办公室里应该有一个。拿到后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcheraccept_000030dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but I want the gun when you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，但我希望你完工后把枪给我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well shite. I guess I'll just get back to work on these ol' combustible engines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的。我想我还是继续研究这些老旧的燃烧引擎吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Butcher [1100BC63] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC88]aaMechanicQuest) What a tool! EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabutchervoicetype\aamechanic_aabutcherdeny_000030dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry old man. I've got work to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，老头。我有工作要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say, Mungo. Well if you're exploring, you wanna help a kid out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你，蒙戈。如果你在探险的话，想不想帮帮小孩子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyprompt_000030f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just exploing. What's it to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是在探险。关你什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome. Now I need you to get my bat back from some other raiders at the Charnel House. Those meanies won't know what hit 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。现在我需要你从肉食者之家的其他掠夺者那里把我的球棒拿回来。那些混蛋不会知道自己是怎么挨打的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyprompt_00003103_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job, Mungo. One last thing. I lost my baseballs in the Wasteland Gypsy village. They're super cranky and hate trespassers. Go get em for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，蒙戈。还有最后一件事。我把我的棒球丢在了废土吉普赛人村庄。他们脾气很坏，讨厌陌生人。去帮我拿回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyprompt_00003104_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks Mungo, now I can play all the baseball I want! You know, for a Mungo, you're not so bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，蒙戈，现在我可以尽情地打棒球了！你知道，对于一个蒙戈来说，你还不算太坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyprompt_00003105_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and this better be it.
It's boring in those caves. I wanna play some baseball but no one will play with me. I used to have a pitching machine I made but it got stolen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这些洞穴里太无聊了。我想打棒球但没人跟我玩。我以前做了一个发球机但它被偷了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyprompt2_000030f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well aren't you a smart Mungo. Yes. Some raiders took my stuff. Are you gonna help me or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你还真是个聪明的蒙戈。没错。一些掠夺者抢了我的东西。你打算帮我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyprompt3_000030f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me guess, you want me to get it for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我来猜猜，你是想让我帮你找回来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome. Alright I had a high powered leaf blower to pitch the balls for me. The raiders took it to their Car Fort. Bring it back quick, Mungo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。好吧，我之前有个高功率的吹风机帮我发球。掠夺者把它带到了他们的汽车堡垒。快点帮我拿回来，蒙戈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmyaccapt_000030f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, Mungo. I hope some Muties eat your eyeballs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你，蒙戈。我希望有些变种人能吃掉你的眼珠子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy [1100BC64] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8D]aaPitchMachineQuest) If you build it... EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aajimmyvoicetype\aapitchmac_aajimmydeny_000030fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not until you learn some manners, little boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你学会礼貌之前，休想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well my parents have been missing for a long time. I was just wondering, if you're not too busy, if you could help me find them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我的父母已经失踪很久了。我在想，如果你不太忙的话，能不能帮我找找他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd Proud [1100BC65] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC86]aaProudQuest) I'm all alone. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatoddvoicetype\aaproudquest_aatoddprompt_00003108_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I can't say I'm surprised. Thank you stranger. I guess I'd better figure out what to do now...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我……我不觉得惊讶。谢谢你，陌生人。我想我现在最好想想该怎么办……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd Proud [1100BC65] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC86]aaProudQuest) I'm all alone. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatoddvoicetype\aaproudquest_aatoddprompt_0000310f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] They died together. I listened to their journals. They loved you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: [谎言] 他们一起去世了。我听了他们的日记。他们非常爱你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they're scientists. Last I knew they were studying radiation behind Takoma Industrial. Please find them. I can't stand not knowing anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他们是科学家。我最后一次知道他们在塔科马工业后面研究辐射。请帮我找到他们。我再也受不了这种一无所知的感觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd Proud [1100BC65] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC86]aaProudQuest) I'm all alone. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatoddvoicetype\aaproudquest_aatoddprompt2_0000310a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... NO... What do I do now? What do I DO?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不……不……我现在该怎么办？我该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd Proud [1100BC65] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC86]aaProudQuest) I'm all alone. EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatoddvoicetype\aaproudquest_aatoddprompt2_00003110_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your mother's hubris got them both killed. They're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你母亲的狂妄自大害死了他们。他们已经不在了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't say that! I hope you die! I hope YOU die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么说！我希望你死！我希望你死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Todd Proud [1100BC65] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC86]aaProudQuest) I'm all alone. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatoddvoicetype\aaproudquest_aatodddeny_0000310c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're probably dead kid. Just move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能已经死了，孩子。向前看吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to have you on our side. But we have a small task for you. Many of our soldiers were not so lucky as to escape the Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你能站在我们这边。但我们有个小任务给你。我们的许多士兵没那么幸运，没能逃脱超级变种人的魔爪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceprompt_00003151_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'd like you to retrieve the dogtags of our fallen. This may seem trivial but its of great importance to some of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们希望你能找回我们阵亡士兵的狗牌。这可能看起来微不足道，但对我们中的一些人来说非常重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceprompt2_00003153_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you like me to do?
Good to hear. Here are the last known locations of our soldiers. Come back to me with any tags you find. I'll give what I can as compensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听到你这么说。这是我们士兵最后出现的地点。你找到任何狗牌后，回来找我。我会尽我所能作为补偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceaccept_00003157_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's no trouble. I'd be happy to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不麻烦。我很乐意帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here are some caps for your dedication. Good luck to you, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。这是给你的瓶盖，作为你的奉献精神的奖励。祝你好运，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceaccept_00003159_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here are some caps for your dedication. Good luck to you, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。这是给你的瓶盖，作为你的奉献精神的奖励。祝你好运，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceaccept_0000315d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here are some caps for your dedication. Good luck to you, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。这是给你的瓶盖，作为你的奉献精神的奖励。祝你好运，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceaccept_0000315c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here are some caps for your dedication. Good luck to you, soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。这是给你的瓶盖，作为你的奉献精神的奖励。祝你好运，士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyqu_aabruceaccept_0000315b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood. Well if you don't mind, we have some work to do reestablishing our compound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了。嗯，如果你不介意的话，我们还有重建营地的工作要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bruce [1100314E] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC8C]aaReillyQuest) Reilly's Fallen EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabrucevoicetype\aareillyquest_aabrucedeny_00003156_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir. I just don't have the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，先生。我只是没时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, yes. Moriarty scared off our suppliers so now we need someone to get us new stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，是的。莫里亚蒂吓跑了我们的供应商，所以现在我们需要有人帮我们找新的货源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquestpr_00003b06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for any help with anything?
First, we need the basics. Twenty beers should do the trick. Come back to me when you find some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我们需要些基础物资。二十瓶啤酒应该就够了。找到后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquestbe_00003b08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next we'll need 10 bottles of Scotch and 10 bottles of Whiskey. Get on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来，我们需要十瓶苏格兰威士忌和十瓶普通威士忌。赶紧行动起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquestsc_00003b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks a bunch. Here's some caps for your troubles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。这是给你的瓶盖，辛苦你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks a bunch. Here's some caps for your troubles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。这是给你的瓶盖，辛苦你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks a bunch. Here's some caps for your troubles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。这是给你的瓶盖，辛苦你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god, I never thought I'd see one of these. Thank you so much. Here, you more than deserve this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦我的天，我没想到还能再见到这个。太感谢你了。给，你绝对值得这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well get on it. Our business can't survive like this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well get on it. Our business can't survive like this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well get on it. Our business can't survive like this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well please find it soon. My mouth waters just thinking about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生意不能再这样下去了。请尽快找到它。一想到它我就流口水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquesttu_00003b17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next we'll need 5 bottles of wine and 5 bottles of vodka. Let me know when you get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来，我们需要五瓶葡萄酒和五瓶伏特加。拿到后告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquestwi_00003b1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always heard about a wonderful bottle of wine called Lafite. Get me that and I'll reward you handsomely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直听说有一种叫拉菲的美酒。给我弄一瓶来，我会重重奖励你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Donny Stahl [11008D18] (mod) Quest : ([11003B02]aaLiquorSupplierQuest) Liquor Supplier EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadonnyvoicetype\aaliquorsu_aaliquorquestla_00003b1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything left for me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么需要我做的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you could. One more dead body won't matter too much at this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可以的。现在多一具尸体也没什么大不了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_00004299_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can keep them. You're gonna need them for this next task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以留着它们。你下一个任务会用到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_000042a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I have them right here.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_000042ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't even know what hit him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他甚至不知道自己是怎么被干掉的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those drugged up assholes have been working on explosives. While I enjoy seeing their mangled bodies they may have stumbled onto something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些被下了药的混蛋一直在研究爆炸物。虽然我很喜欢看他们残缺不全的尸体，但他们可能真的发现了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_0000429c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The raider's have a leader that's been leading the charge since we've gotten here. You need to take him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者有个头目，从我们到这里就一直带头冲锋。你得解决掉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_000042a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you have deserved something in return. Here. Don't spend it all in one place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你应得些回报。给，别一下子全花完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_000042ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch your mouth if you know what's good for you. But if you want to help, it's your funeral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说话小心点，对你没坏处。但如果你想帮忙，那是你自己的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_0000429b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, dick. I just thought I'd help out around here but whatever...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，混蛋。我本来想帮帮你的，但随便吧……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's too bad. You could have used them for this next task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太可惜了。你本来可以用它们来完成下一个任务的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_000042a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd kill you myself if you weren't so valuable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不是这么有价值，我真想亲手杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_000042ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry your pretty little head. He's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，你那颗漂亮的小脑袋。他已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. They have a stash in Alexandria Arms. If you can obtain it, I might have a few caps with your name on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。他们在亚历山德里亚军火库藏有炸药。如果你能拿到，我会用一些瓶盖来奖励你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonprom_0000429e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you need me to retrieve these explosives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我去取回这些炸药？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Get back to me when you have the explosives. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。拿到炸药后回来找我。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonacce_000042a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can take care of that.
I'm glad you're on our side. Come back when he's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你站在我们这边。他死后你再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtonacce_000042a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll be dead before he can pull his gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还没拔出枪就已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see how smug you are when you blow your legs off on one of their mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你踩到他们的地雷炸掉双腿，看你还怎么得意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtondeny_000042a1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the world will get along fine with a few less Brotherhood soldiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这个世界上少几个兄弟会士兵也无妨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, smart-ass. Just get it done will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，聪明人。把它做完行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brotherhood Knight Sergeant [1100BCA5] (mod) Quest : ([11002D98]aaArlingtonQuest) Armed and Dangerous EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabosvoicetype\aaarlingto_aaarlingtondeny_000042a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll just keeping doing YOUR job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。那我就继续干你的活儿吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this guy, Dave, up north of here. He thinks he's a frickin' emperor or something. I want him dead. Interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿北边有个叫戴夫的家伙。他以为自己是个该死的皇帝什么的。我要他死。你感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Alright, as I promised here's the key to my father's armor. It's in the Rock Creek Caverns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的！好吧，如我所承诺的，这是我父亲盔甲的钥匙。它在洛克溪洞穴里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed him. No one saw me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀了他。没人看见我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well this guy, Dave, up north kicked me out of his dingy town for writing a few satirical poems. He didn't care if I lived or died. I want him dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个戴夫，北方的那个，因为他写的几首讽刺诗就把我赶出了他那肮脏的小镇。他才不在乎我是死是活。我要他死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It depends. What do you want me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这要看情况。你想让我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I'd rather pay people. And, as I promised, here's the key to get my father's armor. It's in the Rock Creek Caverns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我宁愿付钱给人。还有，如我所承诺的，这是拿我父亲盔甲的钥匙。它在洛克溪洞穴里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. But you need to learn to take care of your own dirty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。但你得学会自己处理这些肮脏的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but I've got quite the reward for you if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但如果你改变主意，我有丰厚的报酬给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well my father used to be in the Enclave. He had a special suit of armor he used. It's your's if you help me. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我父亲以前曾是英克雷的一员。他有一副特制的盔甲。如果你帮我，它就归你了。你觉得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's south of here. You don't mind a walk, right? Well... get going...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，就在南边。你不介意走一趟吧？好吧……快去……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you'd say yes. Now make sure you're undetected when you kill him. I don't want anyone thinking I sent you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会答应。现在，确保你在杀他时不被发现。我可不想让人以为是我派你去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinaccep_000042bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And here I thought you knew a good deal when you saw one. Oh well. Let me know if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为你看到好交易就认识呢。哦，好吧。如果你改变主意，就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassindeny_000042bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I can't just kill people for no good reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我不能无缘无故地杀人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you may have noticed the lady ghoul outside... Willow? She and I had a romantic rendevous in the Irradiated Metro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你可能注意到了外面的那位女尸鬼……威尔洛？我和她在辐射地铁里有过一段浪漫的邂逅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraprompt1_000042c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a lifesaver! Thank you. Please, take these caps. It's the least I could do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是我的救星！谢谢你。请收下这些瓶盖。这是我唯一能做的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraprompt1_000042d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I've got it right here.
Calm down, smoothskin. I just wanted you to retrieve an item for me. See, that lady ghoul Willow and I spent a little time in the Irradiated Metro...
ESP.TRADUIT: 别激动，人类。我只是想让你帮我拿样东西。你看，那位女尸鬼威尔洛和我在辐射地铁里待过一段时间……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraprompt1_000042c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do! I do! Here. I want bother you again, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说！我说！给你。我不会再打扰你了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraprompt1_000042d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and you better have my money, zombie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你最好把我的钱给我，僵尸！

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were taking some, uh... bedroom photos. Unfortunately, halfway through she got creeped out by ferals staring at us. I accidentall left the camera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们当时正在拍一些……卧室照片。不幸的是，拍到一半时，她被那些野人盯着看，给吓坏了。我不小心把相机落下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraprompt2_000042ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you? I'd go myself but I don't want her to see me slink off to get her nude photos...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我吗？我本来想自己去的，但我不想让她看到我偷偷摸摸去拿她的裸照……你要帮我拿回来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraprompt3_000042cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you want me to get it?
Thank you! I'll owe you big. I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我欠你一个人情。我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraqu_aacameraaccept_000042cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I guess the ferals will get to have all the fun then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。看来那些野兽要占便宜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ernie [1100BCA6] (mod) Quest : ([11002D99]aaCameraQuest) Ghouls Need Love Too EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaernievoicetype\aacameraquest_aacameradeny_000042d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got more important matters at hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有更重要的事情要处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been expecting a delivery, but its been several days and no one has come. I think something must have happened to my delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在等快递，但都好几天了，还没人来。我觉得我的快递可能出问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakepro_000042da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you, Doctor?
What the hell is this? I wanted a simple hammer for the electrical components of my equipment. Not this montrosity. Damn it. Keep the damn thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈的是什么？我只是想要一个普通的锤子来修理设备的电子元件。不是这个怪物。该死。把这个该死的东西拿走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakepro_000042e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been expecting a delivery, but its been several days and no one has come. I think something must have happened to my delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在等快递，但都好几天了，还没人来。我觉得我的快递可能出问题了。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakepro_000042db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get to the point. I'm a very busy person.
Oh well. I'm sure one of those mutants is roaming around with my equipment. Thanks for trying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉。我肯定那些变种人中的一个正带着我的设备四处游荡。谢谢你的帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakepro_000042e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been expecting a delivery, but its been several days and no one has come. I think something must have happened to my delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在等快递，但都好几天了，还没人来。我觉得我的快递可能出问题了。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakepro_000042dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, great. Another random request. What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太棒了。又一个随机请求。是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Precisely. I would check southwest of here. That's the route the delivery would have taken. Can you help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切地说。我应该去这里的西南边找找。那是快递应该经过的路线。你能帮我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakepro_000042dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I need to go find it, right?
Good. But be careful. There are many Super Mutants around that area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。但要小心。那片区域有很多超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakeacc_000042e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll find it for you.
Okay, I'll find someone a little more flexible. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会找个更灵活的人。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Mandrake [1100BCA9] (mod) Quest : ([11002D97]aaDrMandrakeQuest) Late Delivery EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadrmandrakevoicetype\aadrmandra_aadrmandrakeden_000042e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are more crucial matters for me at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在有更重要的事情要处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reality is but perception. In order to transcend, one must alter perception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现实不过是感知。要想超越，就必须改变感知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt1_000042ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. Tell me more.
Now I leave the restraints of this world. Take this as payment. Thank you adventurer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我摆脱了这个世界的束缚。把这个当作报酬。谢谢你，冒险者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt1_000042f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, here they are. Now what will you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，它们在这里。现在你要做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So little patience. When time is nothing but a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么没耐心。当时间不过是个谎言时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt1b_000042ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get to the point hippie.
This world will be but a memory. Take this as payment. Goodbye adventurer. And thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界将只成为回忆。把这个当作报酬。再见，冒险者。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt1b_000042f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah. Here you go druggie. What now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。给你，瘾君子。现在怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no knowledge of such a being. No matter. Peace is intrinsic and personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道什么神秘生物。不过没关系。和平是内在且个人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt1c_000042ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I follow only the teachings of the Flying Spaghetti Monster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只遵循飞天意面怪的教义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I am looking to explore new areas of existence. To do this I need the substances of transcendence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我正在探索存在的新领域。为了做到这一点，我需要超脱的物质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt2_000042ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is one name for them. I know of a few scattered nearby. I would like you to get them for me. Will you accept this journey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是它们的一个名字。我知道附近有一些。我想请你帮我找到它们。你愿意接受这次任务吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugprompt3_000042f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Splendid. Here are the locations of the items I desire. I hope to see you again soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。这是我需要的物品的位置。希望很快能再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugaccept_000042f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I can go grab your drugs for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我可以去帮你拿药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such indignation. It is not good for the soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么愤怒。这对你的灵魂可不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dale [1100BCA3] (mod) Quest : ([11002D93]aaDrugQuest) Irradiated and Confused EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aadalevoicetype\aadrugquest_aadrugdeny_000042f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it, weirdo. Go shoot up behind the dumpsters like the others junkies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧，怪人。跟其他瘾君子一样，去垃圾桶后面过瘾吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Terry Vole [1100BCA4] (mod) Quest : ([11002D96]aaAssassinQuest) The Wasteland Candidate EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaterryvoicetype\aaassassin_aaassassinpromp_000042fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They set up camp in an old sewer nearby. Please convince them to stop... by any means necessary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在附近的一个旧下水道里扎营。请想办法让他们停止……不惜一切代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A62] (ID) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\malegenericghouldc\aagobsques_aagobsquestacce_000048e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. All right. But we'll be back if we hear of any anti-ghoul behavior. Until then, here's a treaty as proof that we will stand down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。好吧。但如果我们听说有任何反尸鬼的行为，我们还会回来的。在此之前，这是停战的条约。证明我们会撤退。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael [11002AEB] (mod) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaghoulmichaelvoicetype\aagobsques_aaghoulextremis_000048ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Strenght 7] Come after my town and you will all pay. Dearly.
ESP.TRADUIT: [力量7] 胆敢来我的镇子，你们会付出代价的。惨痛的代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you're right. Consider Megaton safe... for now. Have this. It's a peace treaty with Megaton. I've signed it. Now get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。暂时认为梅加顿是安全的。拿着。这是和梅加顿的和平条约。我已经签字了。现在滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael [11002AEB] (mod) Quest : ([11002AE2]aaGobsQuest) Ghoulish Turncoat EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaghoulmichaelvoicetype\aagobsques_aaghoulextremis_000048ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really think a whole town will allow you to act without consequences?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的以为整个镇子会允许你们胡作非为而不受惩罚吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife was taken by raiders. I'm sure she's dead by now. But she deserves a proper burial. I just couldn't stand a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妻子被掠夺者抓走了。我确定她现在已经死了。但她值得好好安葬。我根本没有机会救她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt1_00004d42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, stranger. I know it's not much, but take these caps. Now if you'll excuse me, I need to go bury my wife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，陌生人。我知道这不多，但这些瓶盖你拿着。现在如果你不介意的话，我要去埋葬我的妻子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt1_00004d4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife was taken by raiders. I'm sure she's dead by now. But she deserves a proper burial. I just couldn't stand a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妻子被掠夺者抓走了。我确定她现在已经死了。但她值得好好安葬。我根本没有机会救她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt1_00004d43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You brought the dress too? Oh thank you. Please take this as payment. Now if you'll excuse me, I need to go bury my wife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也把裙子带来了？哦，谢谢。请收下这个作为报酬。现在如果你不介意的话，我要去埋葬我的妻子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt1_00004d50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and I also brought you this to bury her in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我还给你带来这个，让她穿着下葬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. You can let yourself out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。你可以自己出去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt1_00004d44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time for this.
Okay. I guess I was asking too much anyway. Thanks for trying...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我想我要求得太多了。谢谢你试着帮忙……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt1_00004d51_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: [谎言] 对不起，她的遗体已经完全毁坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you? I'd be eternally gateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我吗？我会永远感激你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt2_00004d47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could go get her remains for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以去帮你找回她的遗体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If its not too much trouble. I'd be eternally grateful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不太麻烦的话。我会永远感激你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontprompt2_00004d48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blah blah, you want me to get something for you... blah blah...
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴拉巴拉，你想让我帮你拿东西……巴拉巴拉……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so very much. And if you can find me something to bury her in I can give you a few extra caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢你。如果你能帮我找到东西来安葬她，我可以多给你一些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontqu_aadupontaccept_00004d4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Well good luck to you out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解了。那么祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris [1100BCA7] (mod) Quest : ([11002D9A]aaDupontQuest) No Corpse Left Behind EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachrisvoicetype\aadupontquest_aadupontdeny_00004d4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, this? I come from Vault 108. I'm actually a clone. One of many. Unfortunately, I'm probably the only good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这个？我来自108号避难所。我其实是个克隆体。众多克隆体中的一个。不幸的是，我可能是唯一一个好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt1_00004d57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Maybe now I can sleep without any nightmares. Thank you for this. Here. Take this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。也许现在我可以不用再做噩梦了。谢谢你。给。拿着这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt1_00004d65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it easy! I'm just a normal settler. I... I'm a clone. I came from Vault 108. I.. I couldn't stay there any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张！我只是个普通的定居者。我……我是个克隆体。我来自108号避难所。我……我再也无法待下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt1b_00004d58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust you. Who are you and what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不信任你。你是谁？你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well hopefully these caps can provide you some sense of closure instead. Thanks for everything regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，希望这些瓶盖能让你心里好受些。不管怎样，还是谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt1b_00004d66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. But don't be surprised if I kill you just for a sense of closure...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。但如果我为了心里好受些而杀了你，也不要惊讶……

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I was really trying to be different from the others...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的试图变得和其他人不一样……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt1c_00004d59_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 所有的加里都必须死！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other Gary's all lost their minds. I couldn't stay and watch what they've become. If you're heading that way... could you do me a favor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的加里都疯了。我不能留下来看着他们变成这样。如果你往那边走……能帮我个忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt2_00004d5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to kill the other Gary's. They're a danger to themselves and everyone around them. Will you do this for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想请你杀掉其他的加里。他们对自己和周围的人都是个威胁。你愿意帮我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt3_00004d5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you like me to do?
I'd like you to kill the other Gary's. They're a danger to themselves and everyone around them. Will you do this for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想请你杀掉其他的加里。他们对自己和周围的人都是个威胁。你愿意帮我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryprompt3b_00004d5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. They must be stopped. Let me know when you've eliminated them. I'll pay you when it's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。他们必须被阻止。你杀掉他们后告诉我。完成后我会付给你报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagaryaccept_00004d61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I can help you with that.
Alright. Just don't come crying to me when you start finding psychotic Gary's roaming the wasteland...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。但当你开始在废土上遇到精神错乱的加里时，别哭着来找我……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gary X [1100BCAE] (mod) Quest : ([11002D92]aaGaryQuest) Gary Must Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aagaryvoicetype\aagaryquest_aagarydeny_00004d62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you're problem. Not mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像是你的问题。不是我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I enjoy my solitude. But, of course, it comes with a price. I'm running low on supplies. Any chance you'd like to be my delivery boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢独处。但当然，这是有代价的。我的补给快用完了。你想不想做我的送货员？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichprom_00004d79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing down here?
And you're a rude intruder. But instead of shooting you I'm making you an offer. I'm running low on supplies. Would you like to make some caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个粗鲁的闯入者。但我没有射杀你，而是给你一个提议。我的补给快用完了。你想赚点瓶盖吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichprom_00004d7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well aren't you a creepy old man...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你这不是个令人毛骨悚然的怪老头嘛……

ESP.ORIGINAL: No no... wrong place, wrong time. I just need some supplies. I'll pay you of course. Interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不不……来错地方了，来错时间了。我只是需要些补给。我当然会付钱。有兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichprom_00004d7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh geez, you don't want me to hunt down artifacts do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦天呐，你不会想让我去找什么文物吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need a few items. I need purified water, of course. And then for food, I love squirrel bits. And pre-war money... cause it makes good toilet paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些东西。我当然需要纯净水。至于食物，我喜欢松鼠肉干。还有战前货币……因为它能当不错的卫生纸用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichprom_00004d7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Because I like you I'll give you 20 caps for each pre-war money or squirrel food and 50 for each bottle of water. Now go get me my supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。因为我喜欢你，所以每张战前货币或松鼠肉干我给你20个瓶盖，每瓶水我给你50个。现在去给我拿补给吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichacce_00004d80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you were smarter than this...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichdeny_00004d81_1.ogg
