ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] I think I'd rather just kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 我想我还是直接杀了你吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonderful. Here's your caps. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这是你的瓶盖。还有其他需要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichwate_000057d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have one bottle of purified water.
Wonderful. Here's your caps. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这是你的瓶盖。还有其他需要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichsqui_000057d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonderful. Here's your caps. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这是你的瓶盖。还有其他需要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichmone_00004d88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have one stack of pre-war money.
Then stop wasting my time. Get me some supplies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别啰嗦了。去给我找点补给。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcovich [1100BCAB] (mod) Quest : ([11002D90]aaMarcovichQuest) Zone Ranger EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aamarcovichvoicetype\aamarcovic_aamarcovichbye_000057e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm, you really want to be evil? How about killing one of those pitiful piles of crap begging for water and soaking in the radiated sun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，你真想当个恶人吗？去杀一个那些在辐射阳光下乞水、可怜巴巴的废物怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I have to do to convince you I'm not a goody-two-shoes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要怎么做才能让你相信我不是个老好人？
再考虑一下我的提议吧，圣洁的男孩？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: About that offer you made earlier...
That a boy. Come back to me when you kill that beggar in front of town and I might even have something for ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好小子。杀了镇上那个乞丐后再来找我，我或许有东西给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well if it isn't the prodigal son! Good job. But there's still more I'd like you to do. There's more begging scum outside Tenpenny Tower. Get on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是那个浪子回头金不换的家伙嘛！干得好。但我还想让你去做点别的事。十便士塔外面还有很多乞讨的渣滓。去解决掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey killer. You're lookin sharp. There's still one last beggar I'd like you to take out though. He's in front of Rivet City. Come back when its done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，杀手。你看上去真精神。不过还有最后一个乞丐我想让你去解决掉。他在里维特城前。完成后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've gotta be honest. I didn't think you had it in ya. Well, here's your reward. Hope you have lots of fun with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我没想到你能做到。这是你的报酬。希望你玩得开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, your loss. You could've gotten something good out of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那是你的损失。你本可以从中得到些好处的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000ee5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Fail Quest] No. That's going too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: [任务失败] 不行。那太过分了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Of course... I guess... well... no... no I'm not...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？当然……我猜……嗯……不……我不是……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestpro_00005692_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem a little manic. Are you okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看上去有点疯狂。你没事吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Maggie. The girl I take care of. Not many people know this but... she has a heart condition. It's getting worse. Without medicine she might die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是玛吉。我照顾的那个女孩。没几个人知道，她……她有心脏病。情况越来越糟了。没有药她可能会死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestpro_00005694_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you... would you really? Oh my god. Thank you! I know where it is but it's impossible for me to get to. The place's covered with super-mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能……你真的愿意吗？哦，我的天。谢谢你！我知道它在哪儿，但我根本到不了那里。那里全是超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestacc_00005696_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well scavenging is kind of my thing. I'm sure I could find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过搜寻物资正是我的强项。我肯定能找到它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's in the Our Lady of Hope Hospital. Please hurry. Maggie's fine for now but I don't want to tempt fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在希望圣母医院。请快点。玛吉现在还好，但我不想冒险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestacc_00005698_1.ogg
NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestden_0000569a_1.ogg
NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestret_0000569c_1.ogg
NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestret_0000a118_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god. You... I can't... Thank you so much. Here. This is all I can give you. I wish I had more. You really are a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我的天。你……我……太感谢你了。给，这是我唯一能给你的。我希望我能给你更多。你真是个英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquesttur_0000569f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well please hurry. She needs that medication.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你快点。她需要那种药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A65] (ID) Quest : ([1100568D]aaBillyQuest) Maggie's Meds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleadult04dc\aabillyque_aabillyquestnot_000056a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm really craving some human flesh. Like, bad. But Vance doesn't trust me to go out on my own. Could you like bring me some? Body parts... flesh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的很想吃人肉。特别想吃。但万斯不信任我，不让我单独出去。你能给我带点回来吗？四肢……肉……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakeprompt_000056ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow! Thanks man. Please hurry. I feel like my skin is on fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！谢谢你，伙计。请快点。我觉得我的皮肤像着火了一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakeaccept_000056f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um sure I guess. If I find some...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想想。如果我找到了……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh this will be great. Don't you worry. You won't even notice I'm there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那太棒了。别担心。你甚至都不会注意到我在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakeaccept_000056f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess. Just don't go crazy on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想也是。但你别发疯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa! No need to be harsh man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦！没必要这么粗鲁，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakedeny_000056f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! Get away from me you freak!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！你这个怪物，离我远点！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakedeny_000056f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think so. You're really creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不这么认为。你真让人毛骨悚然。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablaketurnin_000056f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I've got it right here.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablaketurnin_000056f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's right here but I'm starting to get concerned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，就在这里，但我开始担心了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. But I talked to Vance and he said I could go out hunting if you stay with me. Are you willing to help me out some more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也不全是。但我和万斯谈过了，他说如果你和我在一起，我就可以出去打猎。你愿意再帮帮我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakefollow_000056f9_1.ogg

NPC : Blake [110056E6] (mod) Quest : ([110056FB]aaBlakeQuest) Lend me a hand... or a leg... EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aablakevoicetype\aablakequest_aablakefollow_000056fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter? You look a little scary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么了？你看起来有点吓人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may have noticed the traps and dead mirelurks while entering our territory. These creatures are a blight on our home and must be eradicated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能注意到了，在进入我们的领地时，那些陷阱和死去的泥沼蟹。这些生物是我们家园的毒瘤，必须被根除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestpromp_00005715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what would you have me do?
There are traitors to our kind in the wasteland. They not only tasted the flesh but they tasted the flesh of The Family. They must atone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土上有背叛我们种族的人。他们不仅食人，甚至吃了家族成员。他们必须赎罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestpromp_00005716_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there is still one who still threatens our kind. He drifts around killing our brothers and sisters. Kill him and you will truly be worthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但还有一个家伙仍在威胁我们的种族。他四处游荡，杀害我们的兄弟姐妹。杀了他，你才能真正证明自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestpromp_00005717_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sense a but coming on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉到你要提条件了……

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Family smiles a smile of relief upon you. You are truly one of us now. Feel welcome and may the blood of your enemy bring you health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 家族将对你展露宽慰的笑容。你现在真的是我们中的一员了。欢迎你的加入，愿敌人的鲜血带给你健康。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestpromp_00005718_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. You must slay at least five of these creatures with this weapon. Carry it with pride and bring it back covered in blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。你必须用这把武器至少杀死五个这种生物。带着荣耀使用它，让它浸满鲜血后带回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestaccep_0000571a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you shall remain nameless in the eyes of The Family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你在家族中就将被遗忘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestdeny_0000571c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need. You have proven yourself worthy of carrying it. But there is still more to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无需如此。你已经证明了自己配得上携带它。但还有更多任务等待着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Samuel [110056FD] (mod) Quest : ([1100572F]aaSamuelQuestZ) Proving yourself to the fold EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aasamuelvoicetype\aasamuelqu_aasamquestturni_0000571e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're running really low on medical supplies. After all of these attacks we could really use some spare stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的医疗物资严重短缺。经过这些袭击后，我们真的急需一些备用的治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blue [11000EC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100572E]aaBlueQuest) Stimpak Blues EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabluevoicetype\aablueques_aabluequestprom_00005720_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really are some kind of saint or something. Alright twenty should tide us over for a while. Come back when you have them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个大好人。好吧，二十支应该足够我们撑一段时间了。拿到后回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blue [11000EC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100572E]aaBlueQuest) Stimpak Blues EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabluevoicetype\aablueques_aabluequestacce_00005722_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. I'll do what I can to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我会尽我所能帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This should be more than enough. Thank you so much. You're definitely this town's hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该足够了。非常感谢。你绝对是这座城镇的英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blue [11000EC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100572E]aaBlueQuest) Stimpak Blues EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabluevoicetype\aablueques_aabluequestacce_00000ecc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, they're right here. I hope this is enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，它们就在这里。希望这些就够了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blue [11000EC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100572E]aaBlueQuest) Stimpak Blues EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabluevoicetype\aablueques_aabluequestdeny_00000eca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry. I need them more than you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉。我比你更需要它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please hurry. We've got a lot of people in pain here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请快点。这里有很多人正受苦呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Blue [11000EC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100572E]aaBlueQuest) Stimpak Blues EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aabluevoicetype\aablueques_aabluequestdeny_00000ecd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I keep randomly groaning like *raaaahhhh...* and I can't focus on anything and I want to eat everything in sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我总是不停地发出*raaaahhhh…*这样的怪声，我无法集中精力，而且我想吃掉眼前的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestpro_000015db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, that's serious. What makes you think that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，这很严重。你怎么会这么想？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well I'll definitely need that! Please get that for me the next time you go out. I really don't want to start roaming around eating smoothskins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那我肯定需要那个！下次你出去的时候请帮我弄来。我真的不想开始四处游荡吃光所有的人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestpro_00005725_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. It's right here. But he said he found a new item that will cure you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。就在这里。但他说他发现了一个能治好你的新物品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I had a chat with Dr. Barrows while you were gone and it turns out that the meds that Rad King was giving me just cause low blood sugar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你不在的时候我和巴罗斯医生聊了聊，结果发现辐射王给我的药只是导致我低血糖而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestpro_00005726_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. That almost makes up for the lost caps. Please, take these as a thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。这几乎能弥补我丢失的瓶盖了。请收下这些作为感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestpro_00005727_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. And I enjoyed every minute of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。而且我每一分钟都很享受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a guy that calls himself the Radiation King. He sells a product called RadBeGone for just this occasion. Go get it for me. And please hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个自称辐射王的人。他卖一种叫RadBeGone的产品，正适合这种情况。去帮我弄来。请快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestacc_000015dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup. That son of a bitch's a snakeoil salesman. Do me a favor and kill him for me. I'll pay you what I would've wasted on my meds for the last month.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。那个混蛋是个卖假药的。帮我杀了他。我会付你本来会浪费在上个月买药上的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestacc_00005729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the meds were causing all the weird behavior?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以那些药是导致所有奇怪行为的原因？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be the first one I chew up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会是第一个被我吃掉的人……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestden_0000572b_1.ogg
NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aahenryvoicetype\aahenryque_aahenryquestden_0000572c_1.ogg
NPC : Henry [11000EFD] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。这是你的瓶盖。还有其他需要吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have twenty bottles of purified water.
I be hiding from the vicious monster, Moby-lurk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在躲避那只凶恶的怪物，莫比潜行怪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyprompt1_00006245_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... hi, Ishmael. What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……嗨，以实玛利。你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joyous day! And as a token of me appreciation, have this gun. It belonged to me dad. I'm sure you'll do wonderful things with it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是愉快的一天！为了表示我的感激，这把枪就送给你了。它是我爸爸的遗物。我相信你一定能做出一番大事业！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyprompt1_0000624f_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀了那只莫比潜行怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This be me only refuge... from the cruel and devious Moby-Lurk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我唯一的避难所……远离残忍狡猾的莫比潜行怪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyprompt1b_00006246_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, Captain Goofy. Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，高飞船长。你为什么在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, I be proud of ye child. Now take this gun. It belong to me dad. It be your's now. You have me thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我都为你感到骄傲，孩子。现在拿着这把枪。它是我爸爸的遗物。现在它是你的了。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyprompt1b_00006250_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I did what YOU couldn't.
Ha... I haven't heard that one before. Any chance you'd be willing to help out a lonely pirate by getting rid of a Moby-Lurk?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈……我从没听说过这种事。你愿意帮我这个孤独的海盗除掉一只莫比潜行怪吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyprompt1c_00006247_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you heard of the new pirate movie? It's rated Arrrrrrrrrggghh!!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过那部新的海盗电影吗？评分是Arrrrrrrrrggghh！！！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moby-Lurk is the fiercest and biggest beast you'll ever see! And he's been tormenting me for as long as I can remember. You must stop him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比潜行怪是你见过的最凶猛、体型最大的野兽！从我记事起，它就一直在折磨我。你必须阻止它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyprompt2_00006248_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aye, you make me so happy! Please come back when ye be rid of the filthy beast...
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，你让我很开心！等你除掉那只肮脏的野兽后，再回来找我……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobyaccept_0000624b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be happy to get rid of such a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意除掉那种东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arggghhh... I be damned. Then be on ye merry way, scallywag!
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼……那我诅咒你。然后你就高高兴兴地走吧，流氓！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ishmael [1100BCAC] (mod) Quest : ([11002D95]aaMobyQuest) Moby-Lurk EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaishmaelvoicetype\aamobyquest_aamobydeny_0000624c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is too ridiculous for me.
Actually, if you have the time and firepower to spare. We're in need of someone to retrieve a hi-tech weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，如果你有时间和火力的话。我们需要一个人去取回一件高科技武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006256_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine operations you all have here. Looking for any assistance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们的行动真不错。需要帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. I'll take that. And here are some caps for you. Now if you're interested, there's more to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。我会收下的。这是给你的瓶盖。如果你有兴趣的话，还有更多事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're quite the asset. If you're up for it, we have one more task for you. It's a big one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可是个大帮手。如果你愿意的话，我们还有一个任务给你。这是个大任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_0000626c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic. Our business is concluded. Here's your reward. Now be on your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。我们的交易完成了。这是你的报酬。现在你可以走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. All of the arrays are disabled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。所有阵列都已被禁用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to take that tone? Look at where you are. Now if you can behave yourself, I have a proposition for you. I need a weapon found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真要用这种语气跟我说话吗？看看你现在在哪里。现在，如果你能表现好一点，我有个提议给你。我需要找到一件武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006257_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh great, another Outcast douche who thinks he's the shit...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦太棒了，又是一个自以为是的废土流浪者……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shame. But we have no use for junk. Here's some caps for your efforts. Is there any chance I can hire you for another job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾。但我们可不需要废物。这是给你的瓶盖，算是你白忙活的报酬。我还有机会再请你做别的工作吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006266_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Lie] It was broken so I threw it away.
ESP.TRADUIT: [说谎] 它坏了，所以我就把它扔了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're really starting to piss me off. But you're worth something to us so I'll let it slide. In fact, if you're up for it there is one more task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的开始让我生气了。但你对我们来说还有点价值，所以我会放过你。事实上，如果你愿意的话，还有一项任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_0000626d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry sweetcakes. I've got your plaything right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，小甜心。你的玩具在我这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy, am I glad I don't have to deal with you anymore. Here's your caps. Now leave me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，我真高兴不用再和你打交道了。这是你的瓶盖。现在别烦我。别
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006274_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 担心，小宝贝。已经解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, if you have the time and firepower to spare. We're in need of someone to retrieve a hi-tech weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，如果你有时间和火力的话。我们需要一个人去取回一件高科技武器。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006258_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's cut to the chase. I'm looking for work. Got any?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们切入正题吧。我在找工作。有吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's called the Lightning Gun. It's a highly unpredictable energy weapon. We can't risk it getting into the hands of the scum you find around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它叫闪电枪。这是一种非常不稳定的能量武器。我们不能冒险让它落入你在这里发现的那些渣滓手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006259_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's another piece of tech we need.A circuit board in a robot called the MasterBrain. He's in the Vault-Tec Headquarters. We need you to get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还需要一件技术设备。一个叫做主脑的机器人中的电路板。他在避难所科技总部。我们需要你去拿到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006267_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to secure the Satcom Arrays. Currently, we don't have the manpower to keep eyes on them. So we need you to disable them. Sound easy enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要确保卫星通讯阵列的安全。目前，我们没有人力来监视它们。所以我们需要你去关闭它们。听起来够简单吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_0000626e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First you have to agree to help us. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，你必须同意帮助我们。你怎么说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_0000625f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Get back to me when you find it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006268_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to have you helping us. I'll be sure to have some caps waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你能帮助我们。我一定会为你准备一些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_0000626f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be back in no time.
I don't have time for your attitude. Are you in or are you out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没时间理你的态度。你是要加入还是要退出？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_0000625e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just give me the info so I can be on my way...
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我信息，让我继续前行……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep talking to me like that and see what happens. Now get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再这样跟我说话，看看会发生什么。现在走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006269_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll keep doing YOUR job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会继续做你的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah yeah, I'm rubber. You're glue. I'll have some caps waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，我是橡皮，你是胶水。我会为你准备一些瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastprompt_00006270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here we go again. This better be worth it.
Good. We suspect the weapon can be found in L.O.B. Enterprises. Come back to me once its securely in your possession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我们怀疑这把武器可以在L.O.B.企业找到。一旦你安全地拥有它，就回来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastaccept_00006260_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured you'd back out. No matter. I'll find someone else.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paladin Wilson [1100BCAD] (mod) Quest : ([11002D91]aaOutcastQuest) Tech Job EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaoutcastcaptainvoicetype\aaoutcastq_aaoutcastdeny_00006261_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我会找别人。抱歉，我现在不能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to hear. Because I'm in need of someone like you to help me with something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听到这个消息。因为我需要像你这样的人来帮助我处理一些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt1_0000627d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I've been in my fair share of scuffles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我经历过不少争斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I guess I'm the last one. Guess I better start scavenging. But I made a deal with you. Do you want the gun, or some caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我想我是最后一个了。我想我该开始搜寻了。但我和你做了交易。你想要枪还是一些瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt1_00006cc9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Here are their guns. They didn't survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。这是他们的枪。他们没有幸存下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Maybe not. Either way, I was wondering if you could help me with something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。也许不是。无论如何，我想知道你是否能帮我个忙……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt1_0000627e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet I could take you in a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌我能在战斗中打败你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks anyway. I guess I'll need to start scavenging for myself. But we made a deal. Do you want the gun or some caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何都要谢谢你。我想我需要开始为自己搜寻了。但我们做了交易。你想要枪还是一些瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt1_00006cca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup. They're all dead. Those chumps didn't stand a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们都死了。那些家伙毫无胜算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a part of a sniper team. We split up to find as much supplies as possible. However, I've long since lost contact with them...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是狙击手团队的一员。我们分开寻找尽可能多的补给品。然而，我已经很久没有和他们联系了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt2_00006cc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you have in mind?
Alright. Here's your caps. Good luck to you out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这是你的瓶盖。祝你好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt2_00006ccb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here are their last known locations. I'll need proof if they're dead. Come back with whatever you find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。这是他们最后的位置。如果他们死了，我需要证据。把你找到的东西带回来给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperaccept_00006cc5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Go on roaming around spreading your asshole fumes through the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，继续在废土上闲逛吧，把你的屁话传播出去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperquest_aasniperdeny_00006cc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's this girl, Bittercup. She's wonderful. And she's dated almost every guy here. But not me. I wrote her a love poem to try to sway her...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，有个女孩叫苦杯，她很棒的！她几乎和这里的每个男孩都约会过！但没有我！我给她写了一首情诗试图打动她……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestpr_00006b2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get to the point kid.
Well I was writing it by the Moonbeam Cinema but some raiders came by and chased me off the field. I left it there. Could you go get it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在月光电影院旁边写它的时候，一些掠夺者来了，把我赶走了！我把它留在那里了！你能帮我把它拿回来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestpr_00006b31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So give it to her. What's the problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它给她吧！有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks man. Bring it back ASAP before she hooks up with someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你伙计！在她和别人约会之前尽快把它带回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestac_00006b33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure kid, I can go get it for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然孩子，我可以帮你去拿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awesome, now I need a gift to go with it. She's really into dark stuff so I'll need a teddy bear, roach meat and three cherry bombs. Get it quickly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，现在我需要一个礼物来搭配它！她真的很喜欢黑暗的东西所以我需要一个泰迪熊、蟑螂肉和三颗樱桃炸弹！快点拿过来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestac_00006b36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, its right here. Sappy stuff, but whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，它就在这里！真恶心，但无所谓！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're too late... she already hooked up with that Blue guy. Just go get me a milk bottle and some vodka and I'll give you my measly savings...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太迟了……她已经和那个蓝头发的家伙在一起了！去给我拿一瓶牛奶和一些伏特加吧！我会给你我微薄的积蓄……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestac_00006b37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup, it's right here. Don't tell me what you're doing with it. Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，它就在这里！别告诉我你打算用它做什么！求你了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like what I like. Now I'm gonna go and forget any of this ever happened. You should too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢我喜欢的东西！现在我要忘记这一切了！你也应该这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestac_00006b38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got it here. But, white Russians? Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里！但是，白俄罗斯人？真的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. Turn your back on love.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestde_00006b35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time for the angsty crap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没时间管这种幼稚的事！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rudolf [11006B22] (mod) Quest : ([11006B23]aaRudolfQuest) Rudolf de Bergerac EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aarudolfvoicetype\aarudolfqu_aarudolfquestde_00006b39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Someone needs to find out whether they're alive or dead. I have some caps to spare. Or a maybe you'd prefer a powerful weapon. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。有人需要查明他们是否还活着。我有一些多余的瓶盖。或者也许你想要一把强大的武器。你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt3_00006cc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like to me check up on them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我去看看他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Here's your gun. Be careful. It's pretty powerful. We use it to take down vertibirds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这是你的枪。小心。它非常强大。我们用它来击落飞鸟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt3_00006ccc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, hot-shot. I'll even give you some caps for your troubles. Or a powerful weapon. Whichever you prefer. Are you interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，小子。我甚至会给你一些瓶盖作为补偿。或者一把强大的武器。随你挑。你感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt3_00006cc4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And your babies need checking up on...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道你的孩子们也需要我帮忙照看……？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's... surprising. Thanks for doing all of this, regardless of the outcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这……真是出人意料。不管怎样，还是谢谢你的帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chuck [1100BCA8] (mod) Quest : ([11002D94]aaSniperQuest) Magnificent Four EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aachuckvoicetype\aasniperqu_aasniperprompt3_00006ccd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Yeah. I'm good. I'm just... I recently enlisted in the Regulators, but I kind of exaggerated about my qualifications. Now I'm in over my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？对，我挺好的。我只是……最近加入了治安官，但我把自己的资历夸大了一些。现在我有点应付不来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt1_00006cd4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! Here are your caps as promised. And please, don't tell anyone about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！这是你应得的瓶盖。还有，请不要告诉任何人这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt1_00006cde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're all dead. Just like you asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都死了。就像你要求的那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! I'm not that freaked out. And I only peed a little. Anyway, if you have some time... I'm kind of screwed unless someone helps me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！我没那么害怕。而且我只是尿了一点。总之，如果你有时间的话……我现在有点麻烦了，除非有人帮我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt1b_00006cd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. Do you need a change of pants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点。你需要换条裤子吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here are your caps. And this never happened. Understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。这是你的瓶盖。就当这件事没发生过。明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt1b_00006cdf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I'm done with your dirty work. Where's my caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我不想再帮你做这种脏活了。我的瓶盖呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, I don't want to fight!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt1c_00006cd6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] You coward. The meek shall inherit a bullet!
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]你这个懦夫。软弱的人只配吃子弹！

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I was going to pay you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt1c_00006ce0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Attack] They're dead. And now you will be too.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]他们都死了。现在你也得死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They sent me to take out three high ranking Talon Captains. But I haven't even killed anyone before. What if I paid you to take them out for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们派我来除掉三名高级塔隆队长。但我以前从没杀过人。如果我付钱让你帮我除掉他们怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonque_aatalonprompt2_00006cd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just tell me what's going on.
OH sweet baby Jesus. Thank you! I promise I'll have lots of caps waiting for you when you come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天哪，太感谢你了！我保证你回来时会有很多瓶盖等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonquest_aatalonaccept_00006cda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll take care of the Talon Captains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会解决掉那些塔隆队长的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I have caps! Please reconsider!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我有瓶盖！请再考虑一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Spencer [1100BCAA] (mod) Quest : ([11002D8F]aaTalonQuest) Merc Regulation EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaspencervoicetype\aatalonquest_aatalondeny_00006cdb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tisk tisk, no one likes a sour tongue. I thought I might proposition you for a task or two. If you have the time of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啧啧，没人喜欢说话刻薄的人。我本来想给你一两个任务。当然，如果你有时间的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Zaroff [1100BC61] (mod) Quest : ([1100BC89]aaHunterQuest) Happy Hunting EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aazaroffvoicetype\aahunterqu_aazaroffpromptb_00006e78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, creep. Slow down before you bring out the body parts in pickle jars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，怪人。在你把泡在泡菜罐里的身体部位拿出来之前，最好先慢下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always good to meet another dog lover. I'm actually in a bit of a pickle at the moment. Any chance you could lend a hand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴遇到另一个爱狗的人。我现在有点麻烦了。你能帮我一把吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogprompt_00007bce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I'll try not to judge you too harshly for that. Anyway, I'm actually in a bit of a jam right now. Think you could lend a hand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不会因为那件事对你太苛刻的。总之，我现在有点困境。你能帮我一把吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogpromptb_00007bcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm actually more of a cat person.
These little guys never leave my side. But I can't just go out for groceries whenever I'd like. I need someone to get me some food for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些小家伙从不离开我身边。但我不能随时出去买杂货。我需要你帮我给他们找点吃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogprompt2_00007bd1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you? They're really big fans of yao guai meat. I know, I pamper them too much, but they're stubborn little things. Still interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我吗？他们非常喜欢吃妖怪肉。我知道，我太宠他们了，但他们很固执。你还感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogprompt3_00007bd3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could get some food for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以给他们找点吃的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it's not too much to ask. They LOVE yao guai meat. I know, I pamper them too much, but they're stubborn little things. Interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果要求不过分的话。他们非常喜欢吃妖怪肉。我知道，我太宠他们了，但他们很固执。你感兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogprompt3b_00007bd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sense an annoying errand request coming on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉到又一个烦人的跑腿任务要来了……

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you! Ten should do it. I'll have some caps waiting for you. Please come back soon, their little ribs are starting to show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢你！十份应该够了。我会准备好瓶盖等你的。请快点回来，他们的小肋骨都开始露出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogaccept_00007bd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh you're such a wonderful person! We... I mean, THEY... are really going to enjoy this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你真是太好了！我们……我是说，他们……一定会很喜欢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogaccept_00007bdb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much hatred. You need what you need? A dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多怨恨。你需要什么？一只狗吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogdeny_00007bd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get lost you dog loving freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开，你这个爱狗的怪人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well come back when you do. You don't want these little guys to starve to death, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，等你需要的时候再回来。你不想让这些小家伙饿死，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Paul [11007BCC] (mod) Quest : ([11007BC9]aaDogQuest) Where's the Beef? EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aapaulvoicetype\aadogquest_aadogdeny_00007bdc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should I be? Civilization goes to hell and everyone forgets what's really important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为什么要这样？文明世界崩塌了，每个人都忘记了真正重要的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Trout [11007BE1] (mod) Quest : ([11007BE3]aaTroutQuest) Time Enough At Last EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatroutvoicetype\aatroutquest_aatroutprompt_00007be9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to be in a very good mood.
And here I thought humankind was evolving into brainless amoebas. Thank you for your kindness... Now get going. I've got reading to do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为人类已经进化成无脑的阿米巴虫了呢。谢谢你的好意……现在快走吧。我要看书了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Trout [11007BE1] (mod) Quest : ([11007BE3]aaTroutQuest) Time Enough At Last EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatroutvoicetype\aatroutquest_aatroutprompt_00007bf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better enjoy these. The streets were crawling with Super Mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好好好享受这些。街上到处都是超级变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: BOOKS! Oh sure, everyone can still read, but just enough to read the proper amount of pills to take to treat their radiation. No one reads for fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 书！哦，当然，每个人仍然可以阅读，但只是为了阅读正确数量的药片来治疗他们的辐射病。没有人是为了娱乐而读书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Trout [11007BE1] (mod) Quest : ([11007BE3]aaTroutQuest) Time Enough At Last EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatroutvoicetype\aatroutque_aatroutprompt2_00007beb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've run out of books to read. I need something new and exciting! I need something intelligent and witty. I need... I need...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没书可读了。我需要一些新的、令人兴奋的东西！我需要一些有智慧且诙谐的作品。我需要……我需要……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Trout [11007BE1] (mod) Quest : ([11007BE3]aaTroutQuest) Time Enough At Last EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatroutvoicetype\aatroutque_aatroutprompt3_00007bed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who cares, don't you have enough to read by yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁在乎呢，你自己不是有很多书可读吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES! I mean, if you don't mind. There should be some short stories or something in the Capitol Post. Yes. Get me those. Before I lose my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！我是说，如果你不介意的话。《国会邮报》上应该有一些短篇小说之类的。对。帮我把那些弄来。在我发疯之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Trout [11007BE1] (mod) Quest : ([11007BE3]aaTroutQuest) Time Enough At Last EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aatroutvoicetype\aatroutque_aatroutprompt4_00007bef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need me to get you something to read?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我帮你找点东西来读吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why of course, sir! This marvelous wonder can be yours for 100 caps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，先生！这个奇妙的宝贝只要100个瓶盖就能归你所有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingprompt_00007fb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most definitely. It's an exciting new item. It can be yours for a mere 200 caps!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然有。这是个令人兴奋的新产品。它只要200个瓶盖就能归你所有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingprompt_00007fba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard about a new miracle cure. Do you have it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说了一种新的奇迹疗法。你有吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? And what makes you say that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？你这么说是什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingprompt_00007fbe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonderful! Here you go sir. And if you like that be sure to come back for our new Miracle Cure. It should completely cure growing radiation sicknes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！给你，先生。如果你喜欢的话，一定要回来试试我们的新奇迹疗法。它应该能完全治愈不断恶化的辐射病！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingprompt_00007fb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a bottle of medicine? Jeez... Fine.
Oh how exciting! You'll really be amazed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太令人兴奋了！你一定会大吃一惊的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingprompt_00007fbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, so what are you gonna do about it?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingprompt_00007fbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those pills just cause low blood sugar!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些药片只会让血糖降低！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, sir. But I am trying to run a business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，先生。但我在努力做生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryquest_aaradkingdeny_00007fb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well let me know when you do. I can't hold onto this forever you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你有了再告诉我。我可不能一直帮你留着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryquest_aaradkingdeny_00007fbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay okay here you go!.... But I'm still gonna have to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧，给你！....不过我还是得杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingpersua_00007fc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me back my caps or you die. Right here. Right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我的瓶盖还给我，否则你就得死。就在这里。就现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see you try.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Radiation King [11000F03] (mod) Quest : ([11000EFC]aaHenryQuest) Going Feral EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\aaradkingvoicetype\aahenryque_aaradkingfight_00007fc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna take my caps back. After I kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我杀了你，再把我的瓶盖拿回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't got the stomach for it wittle bwaby? Tell you what, I've got a powerful little shotgun with your name on it if you grow a pair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小家伙，你没那个胆子吧？告诉你，如果你够胆，我这儿有一把威力巨大的霰弹枪，上面还刻着你的名字呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\wwm.esm\maleuniquejericho\aajerichos_aajerichosquest_0000dde8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might like you, kid. Come back to me after you kill that beggar in front of town and I might even have a present for ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我可能有点喜欢你了，孩子。等你杀了镇子前面的那个乞丐，再回来找我，我或许还会给你准备一份礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all mad here. I'm just trying to have a little fun. It's your call but I've got a present waiting for ya if you do as I ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这儿的人都有点疯。我只是想找点乐子。你自己看着办吧，但如果你按我说的做，我有一份礼物等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [06000A71] (ID) Quest : ([11008B2D]aaJerichosQuest) Hobo Killer EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 教堂医生需要10支抗辐宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest Stage : 10 Index : 0

ESP.TRADUIT: 教堂医生需要10支抗辐宁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Rusty's beloved books in Hamilton's HideAway
ESP.TRADUIT: 在汉密尔顿的藏身处找到锈迹斑斑的心爱书籍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the RadBeGone from the Radiation King.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从辐射王那里取回辐射消除器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the miracle cure from the Radiation King.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从辐射王那里取回奇迹解药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Gob by calming the ghoul extremists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助高柏平息尸鬼极端分子的怒火。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Gob with the treaty when the matter is settled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情解决后，带着条约返回高柏处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take out the three Talon captains for Spencer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为斯宾塞除掉三个鹰爪队长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the unique laser weapon from L.O.B. Enterprises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从L.O.B.企业取回独特的激光武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the circuit board from the MasterBrain in Vault-Tec HQ.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从避难所科技总部的主脑那里取回电路板。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disable the consoles in the Satcom Arrays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 禁用卫星通信阵列的控制台。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exterminate the evil Gary's in Vault 108.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭108号避难所里的邪恶加里们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Gary X that the evil Gary's have been eliminated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉加里X，邪恶加里们已被消灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Chuck's crew and/or bring back something as proof of their passing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到查克的船员，和/或带回他们已逝的证据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Dave while undetected or Kill Terry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在不被发现的情况下杀死戴夫，或杀死特里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Track down Dr. Mandrake's lost shipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 追踪曼德拉克博士丢失的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the makeshift mines from Alexandira Arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从亚历山德拉军火库取回简易地雷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Brotherhood Knight Sergeant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回兄弟会骑士中士处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take out the Raider Leader in the Arlington Sewer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除掉阿灵顿下水道里的掠夺者头目。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Brotherhood Knight Sergeant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回兄弟会骑士中士处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve Ernie's Camera from the Irradiated Metro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从辐射地铁中取回厄尼的照相机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reclaim Chris's wife's remains. (optional bring back a dress to bury her in from Lady Frumperton's Fashions)
ESP.TRADUIT: 找回克里斯妻子的遗骸。（可选：从弗伦普顿夫人时装店带回一件裙子，用于安葬她）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donny Stahl needs 20 beers to stock the Brass Lantern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐尼·斯塔尔需要20瓶啤酒来补充黄铜灯笼的存货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donny Stahl needs 10 bottles of Scotch & 10 bottles of Whiskey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐尼·斯塔尔需要10瓶苏格兰威士忌和10瓶波本威士忌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donny Stahl needs 5 bottles of wine & 5 bottles of vodka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐尼·斯塔尔需要5瓶葡萄酒和5瓶伏特加。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donny Stahl wants you to find a bottle of Lafite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐尼·斯塔尔想让你找到一瓶拉菲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Digoxin for Maggie in Our Lady of Hope Hospital
ESP.TRADUIT: 在希望圣母医院为马吉找到地高辛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lend me a hand... or a leg...
Blake's hungry. Bring him body parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱克饿了。给他带点肉来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take Blake with you to get something to eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带布莱克一起去吃点东西。
用仪式战刀杀死5只泥沼蟹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring Rudolf a Teddy Bear, some radroach meat, and 3 cherry bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给鲁道夫带一个泰迪熊、一些蟑螂肉和三颗樱桃炸弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring Rudolf a milk bottle and some vodka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给鲁道夫带一瓶牛奶和一些伏特加。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring ten pieces of yao guai meat to Paul for his dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给保罗的狗带十块妖怪肉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the three books of short stories in the Capitol Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在《国会邮报》上找到三本短篇小说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Todd's parents' camp behind Takoma Industrial Factory and figure out what happened. (Read their terminal entries)
ESP.TRADUIT: 在塔科马工业工厂后面找到托德的父母的营地，弄清楚发生了什么。（阅读他们的终端记录）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Todd to give him the bad news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到托德那里，告诉他坏消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the release lever from Red Racer Factory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从红色赛车工厂拿到释放杆。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the cocking handle from Hubris Comics.
Get the Bent Frame from Corvega Factory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从科维加工厂拿到弯曲框架。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the butt plate from the Scrapyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从废品厂拿到枪托底板。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunt the Ant Queen in the Musty Caverns
ESP.TRADUIT: 在霉臭洞穴里猎杀蚁后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunt the Mama Yao Guai in the Yao Guai Cave (Cliffside Cavern)..
ESP.TRADUIT: 在崖壁洞穴里猎杀母妖怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunt the Mirelurk King in the Mirelurk Nesting Hole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在泥沼蟹巢穴里猎杀泥沼蟹王。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunt the Alpha Deathclaw in the Old Olney sewers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在老奥尼污水管里猎杀阿尔法死亡爪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find the dogtags of Reilly's fallen rangers and bring them back to Bruce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到赖利倒下的游骑兵的身份牌，带回给布鲁斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get Jimmy's high-powered leaf blower back from the Car Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去汽车堡垒把吉米的强力吹叶机拿回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get Jimmy's favorite baseball bat back from the raiders at the Charnel House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去殓尸屋从掠夺者那里夺回吉米最爱的棒球棒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get some baseballs back from the cranky wastelanders in the Gypsy Village..
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吉普赛村从那些脾气暴躁的废土人手中夺回一些棒球。
